XMLmind DITA Converter JavaTM API

Packages 
Package Description
com.xmlmind.ditac.convert
Implementation of the ditac command-line utility.
com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess
Implementation of com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess.PreProcessor, the ditac preprocessor.
com.xmlmind.ditac.util
Utilities and helpers used to implement com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess.PreProcessor, the ditac preprocessor.
com.xmlmind.ditac.xslt
Implementation of the Saxon extension functions needed to run the XSL stylesheets found in ditac_install_dir/xsl/.
com.xmlmind.util
Utilities and helpers used by various XMLmind projects.
